snippet.title: DEPRISION | Official Alpha Gameplay | 2022 Version
snippet.description:
Part of the presentation on March 11:

In this brief gameplay teaser, we get a glimpse of how the game looks in an early alpha test build, used to evaluate performance. It showcases a snippet of the environment and the camera movement system, featuring a fisheye lens Bodycam and head movement system, along with other features that will be available on our website.

Find DEPRISION on:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1804730/DEPRISION/
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/deprision-1dc41e
Official Website: https://deprisiongame.com/
X (formerly Twitter): https://twitter.com/deprisiongame
Find AleProgramadorStudios on:

lnk.bio: https://lnk.bio/AleProgramadorStudios
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/aleprogramadorstudios
X (formerly Twitter): https://twitter.com/AleGamesStudios
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/aleprogramadorstudios
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@aleprogramadorstudiossrl
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@AleProgramadorStudiosSRL
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/alegamesstudiossrl/
Release Date: Q4 2025.

This official site is managed by United Star Games as an internal team but contains materials owned by Revise Entertainment.
